textos.txt: How... How did you find me here?
I could have sworn the autobots would have made it impossible to get here.
If you think it will be easy to get the sixth and final requirement, you're sorely mistaken.
I just want to get back to my world, I still have so much to do... you're an analyst, right?
You know how it is... I can't be late with my analyses.
Then you better hurry, because even if you collect all the requirements, the challenge won't be over.
You will still have to battle Megatron, the boss of this factory.
I'm not one to give advice, but be careful, for I know his questions are as deadly as his mechanical arms.
Deadly???... well, I better strike first before getting hit by one of those.
Hmm, feeling confident, are you? We'll see...
But now your test is with me.
Considering that all the laboratories listed below are accredited under NBR ISO/IEC 17025. Which alternative represents a NON-conformity based on the mentioned management system?

alternativas.txt: A soil analysis laboratory has established a calibration program with a frequency determined by procedure.
A laboratory that conducts field analyses transports its equipment in bubble wrap, following the knowledge of someone experienced in transportation.
The AsdXy laboratory performs intermediate verifications in addition to calibrations. Calibrations take place every two years or when a need is identified.
A laboratory has recently had one of its activities accredited and only declares compliance with the standard for that activity.
The AsdXy laboratory ensures continuous improvement of the activities within its management system.

textos.txt: Now you know what to do.
Find all the scrolls if you haven't already!
The path to your final challenge will only open after that.
Now leave me, before others find my hiding place.
